description: Notification of a configuration management event as
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaConfigManEvent ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventCommandSource i 0 ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventConfigSource i 0 ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventConfigDestination i 0 ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventConfigSourceURLScheme s EXAMPLE ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventConfigDestURLScheme s EXAMPLE

description: The source from where the config command was initiated.
variables.name: ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventCommandSource

description: The configuration data source for the event.
variables.name: ARISTA-CONFIG-MAN-MIB::aristaCmdHistoryEventConfigSource

description: The configuration data destination for the event.
